virtues.name: Irrational
virtues.quote: Reeling, gasping, taken over the edge into madness!

virtues.name: Masochistic
virtues.quote: Those who covet injury find it in no short supply.

virtues.name: Selfish
virtues.quote: Self-preservation is paramount - at any cost!

virtues.name: Hopeless
virtues.quote: There can be no hope in this hell, no hope at all.

virtues.name: Paranoid
virtues.quote: The walls close in, the shadows whisper of conspiracy!

virtues.name: Fearful
virtues.quote: Fear and frailty finally claim their due.

virtues.name: Abusive
virtues.quote: Frustration and fury, more destructive than a hundred cannons.

quotes: The bulwarks of the mind have fallen!
Madness - sublimity of the intelligence, or so it has been said.
One can sometimes find clarity in madness, but only rarely...
Even the aged oak will fall to the tempest's winds.
The mind cannot hope to withstand such an assault.
The human mind - fragile like a robin's egg.
